meanings.definition: Devs: plural noun meaning developers or programmers.
meanings.sent1: The devs worked hard on the new app.
meanings.sent2: Many devs attended the coding conference.
meanings.sent3: The devs joked about debugging over lunch.
meanings.sent4: The devs were the architects of the digital world.
meanings.sent5: The devs' creativity knows no bounds.

meanings.definition: Devs: verb meaning to develop or create.
meanings.sent1: She devs websites for a living.
meanings.sent2: They devs innovative solutions to problems.
meanings.sent3: He devs a plan to surprise his friends.
meanings.sent4: The team devs a strategy for success.
meanings.sent5: The artist devs beautiful paintings with passion.

meanings.definition: Devs: adjective meaning relating to development or programming.
meanings.sent1: The devs team met to discuss the project.
meanings.sent2: Her devs skills are highly sought after.
meanings.sent3: The devs challenge kept them on their toes.
meanings.sent4: His devs mindset helped him excel in the tech industry.
meanings.sent5: The devs environment was buzzing with creativity.
